column4: Usually, I use ls /path/to/file_name to make sure its what I want before running any commands to change the file

scp
why scp ?
Because you want to copy a file to another machine, presumably over a network
no, that isnt specifying the destination target
For example, scp /path/to/file_name user@192.168.1.105:/path/to/destination/folder/
